favorites.placeholder: Search for clans to add them as favorites

configtool.description:
This is a tool that i built for myself and thought maybe others can use it too.
It came from having multiple clients (EU, NA, ST, PublicTest, ...) for which i always had to go into the engine_config to set things like maxFrameRate after every update.
While in the main client i could do that with AslainsMod, i usually set more than just the framerate. Additional to that, in the special clients mods don't work and it was easier to just write a tool that adjusts all clients at the same time.

I originally found information about these values in this post https://forum.worldofwarships.com/topic/42946-engine_configxml-fps-loading-stuttering-fix/ and i just stuck with it ever since.

If you have any parameters in the engine_config you think i should add just ping me on discord. :)
configtool.descriptionShort:
This tool writes the enabled values into res\engine_config.xml and the configs inside res_mods for all seperate clients. A backup of each file is created at the same location.
Only use if you know what you're doing.

maxFrameRate.caption: MaxFrameRate
maxFrameRate.summary: Sets the upper frame rate limit

streamCacheSizeKB.caption: StreamCacheSizeKB
streamCacheSizeKB.summary: Might increase performance when setting a higher value. Multiples of 1024 suggested. Wouldn't go higher than your actual VRAM

versionedReplays.caption: VersionedReplays
versionedReplays.summary: Should replays be saved in versioned folders

monitor.emptyNoToken: Connect to a desktop client to receive match updates
monitor.noBattles: Player has no battles on this ship yet

pathPicker.description:
Select the main installation folder of World of Warships.
If you have the WGC installation the path should look similar to this:
C:\Games\World of Warships
If you have the Steam installation the path should look similar to this:
C:\Programs\Steam\common\World of Warships

settings.description: When enabled your settings will be synced across all your devices and saved in the database with your account.

delete.content:
Are you sure you want to remove this wargaming account from your profile?
You can always re-connect it as long as it is not connected to another user.

service.hostConnected: Gateway connected and desktop client paired

browser.hostDisconnected: Gateway connected but no desktop client is paired.
browser.noToken: Gateway connected but no desktop client token found.

coloredValues.caption: Colored Values
coloredValues.summary: When enabled the values of damage, winrate, battles, frags and PR will be colored according to the wows-numbers color scheme.

fontsize.caption: Fontsize
fontsize.summary: Change the fontsize of the player and team panels.

highContrastMode.caption: Hight Contrast Mode
highContrastMode.summary: Inverts the colors of background and text for the player panels.

layoutMode.caption: Layout Mode
layoutMode.summary: Choose the layout for the player panels. Legacy is like the 'old' monitor. Compact has icons instead of labels.

playerBackgrounds.caption: Player Backgrounds
playerBackgrounds.summary: Choose wether you want the background color to be of the pr, winrate or no specific color.

playerBackgroundsMode.caption: Player Backgrounds Mode
playerBackgroundsMode.summary: Choose wether you want the player panels to have the background color as the actual background, just on the left border or not at all.

soloStats.caption: Solo Stats
soloStats.summary: Select for which type of stat you'd like to see the solo values.

teamWinrate.caption: Team Winrate
teamWinrate.summary: Select what type of average winrate you want to see in the team panels.

allowBeta.caption: Allow Beta Releases
allowBeta.summary: When enabled app will check for releases in beta state.

anonymIp.caption: IP anonymization
anonymIp.summary: Don't send my IP for analytics requests.

autoUpdate.caption: Automatic Update
autoUpdate.summary:
When enabled app will check for a new version at each start. Highly recommended.
This will have no effect if you are using the portable version.

closeToTray.caption: Close to tray
closeToTray.summary: When enabled app will minimize to tray upon clicking the close icon.

overwriteReplaysDirectory.caption: Replays directory
overwriteReplaysDirectory.summary: If for some reason the automatic detection does not work for you, you can manually overwrite the replays directory here.

remoteConfig.content: Your local settings are different than the ones found online. Please select which one you want to use.

anonymScreenshot.caption: Anonymize Names
anonymScreenshot.summary: When enabled the screenshot function will anonymize the player names.

screenshotPath.caption: Screenshot path
screenshotPath.summary: Additional to storing the screenshot in your clipboard, you can save them to a specified location.

showWowsKarma.caption: WoWs Karma integration
showWowsKarma.summary: When enabled the karma will show a combined value of the WG karma value and the wows-karma.com value. This one can be negative.

alreadyConnected.details: Account is already connected to another user

wgError.details: An error occurred when verifying your Wargaming identity

browser.description: Connect to a desktop app by following the steps below:
browser.step1: 1. Scan the QR-Code from the desktop app.
browser.step2: 2. Enjoy as you will receive match stats.
browser.title: Web-Connect

desktop.description:
This feature is mainly for people who don't own a second screen and don't want to tab out of the game.
Visit app.wows-monitor.com on your second device (phone, laptop, etc) and open the Web-Connect popup or copy the url and open it on your second device.
After you scanned this QR-Code you will receive all match updates on your second device.
desktop.title: Web-Connect
